name: Paper-dita-keys-as-public-anchor-ids
tagline: A paper describing best practices for using keys in order to best support the generation of reliable public anchor IDs in online deliverables
body:
paper-dita-keys-as-public-anchor-ids
====================================

A paper describing best practices for using keys in order to best support the generation of reliable public anchor IDs in online deliverables
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
